TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable ActivityTemplateVariable extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code. SharePoint 2013 includes the following APIs for working with feeds: .NET client, JavaScript, REST, and server. See Work with social feeds in SharePoint 2013 to choose the API for your specific feed-related programming tasks. Defines formatting for objects, the structure that contains the standard vocabulary for mapping activity events to syndication feeds.

remarks.para: This object is used by the feed-generating methods (such as GetActivityEventsByMe) in . It should contain data for all the tags in the templates for the to which this ActivityEvent belongs. Otherwise, those tags will be ignored. Any data in the ActivityTemplateVariable that is not used by any template tag will also be ignored.
This object helps support the SyndicationFeed object model.

MemberSignature.Value: public DateTime DateOnly { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.DateTime DateOnly
Public Property DateOnly As DateTime
public: property DateTime DateOnly { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the DateTime object representing the publication date of a feed represented as a year, month, and day only.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool DateOnlySpecified { get; set; }
.property instance bool DateOnlySpecified
Public Property DateOnlySpecified As Boolean
public: property bool DateOnlySpecified { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the DateOnly field of the feed is to be specified.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string DateOnlyToString (string tag, Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ActivityTemplateVariable atv, Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ContentType ct, System.Globalization.CultureInfo ci);

.method public static hidebysig string DateOnlyToString(string tag, class Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ActivityTemplateVariable atv, valuetype Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.ContentType ct, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo ci) cil managed
Public Shared Function DateOnlyToString (tag As String, atv As ActivityTemplateVariable, ct As ContentType, ci As CultureInfo) As String

public: static System::String ^ DateOnlyToString(System::String ^ tag, Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::ActivityTemplateVariable ^ atv, Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::ContentType ct, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ ci);

Docs.param: To be added.
The ActivityTemplateVariable whose DateOnly property is to be converted into a string.
The ContentType that is to be returned. If the ContentType is Html, then the string will be HTML-encoded.
The CultureInfo for this date string. This will determine the format of the date.
Docs.summary: Static method that converts the DateOnly property of the specified ActivityTemplateVariable into a string.

remarks.para: Returns a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the DateOnlySpecified value of the specified ActivityTemplateVariable is not set to true.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.Link Link { get; set; }
.property instance class Microsoft.Office.Server.ActivityFeed.Link Link
Public Property Link As Link
public: property Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::Link ^ Link { Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::Link ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Server::ActivityFeed::Link ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Link object that represents an item in a feed.

remarks.para: The object in this property matches with SyndicationLink List property.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Link object that represents an additional link for an item in a feed.

remarks.para: This value is used by when it is configured for a multivalued display.
